title: Bonus Episode - Because I Watched Delhi Crime
description:
A Pakistani journalist catches the attention of the President after speaking out about the desperate need for women's representation in media.Â 

This essay was scripted by Rabia Chaudry, based on the Netflix Original Series Delhi Crime.

Introducing a new podcast by Netflix, Because I Watched. Search and subscribe to Because I Watched on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, or wherever you get your podcasts.
